subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: South Africa defeated the United States, 64-15, in the final group game at the rugby World Cup, sending the American team home from France without a victory. South Africa will face Fiji in the quarterfinals.
snippet: South Africa defeated the United States, 64-15, in the final group game at the rugby World Cup, sending the American team home from France without a victory. South Africa will face Fiji in the quarterfinals.
